content: I agree with a lot of these, especially the Apple Watch notes. I’ve had mine since launch and I love it, but there are nagging issues that haven’t gone away. Namely snappiness and far too many apps that have no purpose on a wrist. The app cloud is just a horrible paradigm. I think the side button doesn’t need to be there as well. I love the wheel but every so often it gets… stuck. I like the idea of contextual watch faces, kind of like how Sailfish has ambiences. Anyway, great read.
